note:
In a relationship of 25 years with my dear Phillip.

We adopted 2 boys, about 20 years ago, when they were 12 and 13. We did the best we could to raise them like they were our own. That was a big challenge. One of them still lives with us (now 33 years old).

I work for an all-remote startup company, as a software developer.

And I love to run.

It's good to be here with you all!
